sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { useState } from "react"; import { Flex, Heading, Input, Button, FormControl, FormLabel, Switch, Avatar, useColorMode, useColorModeValue, FormHelperText, InputGroup, InputRightElement, InputLeftElement, Link, Box, background, } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import './form.css' import { EmailIcon,ViewOffIcon} from '@chakra-ui/icons' function Form() { const { toggleColorMode } = useColorMode(); const formBackground = useColorModeValue('gray.300','gray.700'); const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const handleShowClick = () => setShowPassword(!showPassword); return ( Welcome Нэвтрэх нэр } /> Нууц үг } /> forgot password? {/* Enable Dark Mode? */} New to us?{" "} Sign Up ) } export default Form
